places.name: Oyu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: The symbol of Nozawa Onsen and the most famous of the 13 public baths.

local_info.local_tips: The hottest and most popular. Try early morning for quieter experience.

places.name: Kawahara-yu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Located near the river, known for its therapeutic waters.

local_info.local_tips: Slightly cooler than Oyu, good for those who find Oyu too hot.

places.name: Kumanote-ara
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Named after a legend of a bear washing its injured paw here.

local_info.local_tips: One of the quieter baths, good for relaxation.

places.name: Akiha-no-yu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Located near Akiha shrine, popular with locals.

local_info.local_tips: Popular with locals who come daily.

places.name: Juodo-no-yu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: One of the larger public baths with good facilities.

local_info.local_tips: Spacious compared to other public baths.

places.name: Matsuba-no-yu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Pine Needle Bath - located in quieter area of village.

local_info.local_tips: One of the quieter, more peaceful baths.

places.name: Nakao-no-yu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Centrally located bath, moderate temperature makes it popular.

local_info.local_tips: Good for those who find other baths too hot.

places.name: Shinyu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Despite the name, this is not new - renovated traditional bath.

places.name: Kamitera-yu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Located in upper part of village near temple area.

places.name: Asagama-no-yu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Named after the famous Asagama hot spring source. Features Glauber's salt-gypsum-sulfur spring water believed to help with hemorrhoids, diabetes, rheumatism, and neuralgia.

local_info.local_tips: Draws water from the famous Asagama source used for cooking vegetables.

places.name: Yokochi-no-yu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Known for unique architecture and peaceful atmosphere.

local_info.local_tips: Hidden gem, less known to tourists.

places.name: Taki-no-yu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Named after nearby waterfall, one of the most scenic locations.

places.name: Ogama (Cooking Onsen)
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Not for bathing! Used by villagers to cook vegetables and eggs in the 90°C water.

local_info.local_tips: Great photo spot. Watch locals cooking vegetables. Do not touch water!

places.name: Shinden-no-yu
places.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502
places.description: Located behind Nishinomiya Shrine at the village entrance. Recently renovated with beautiful new building. The sulfur-sodium-calcium-sulfate waters share therapeutic properties with the Asagama source.

local_info.local_tips: Near Shinden bus terminal. Popular with locals, less crowded with tourists. Good for those who find other baths too hot.
